survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Digital Wallet Features Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and satisfaction levels regarding features and usability of digital wallet applications.

questions.question_text: Which digital wallet applications do you currently use?
questions.client_notes: Multiple selections allowed. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional entries.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which digital wallet applications do you currently use?

questions.question_text: How often do you use digital wallet applications for payments?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected at least one digital wallet in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure frequency. Ensure the options are mutually exclusive.
